title: Yearly Summary: 100% completion celebration modal reference-match + default image

requirements.summary: Match the 100% completion celebration modal headline style, emoji usage, and message copy to the reference screenshots in the “Time-Bound targets - 2026” view.
acceptanceCriteria: When a month transitions to 100% completion, the modal appears and the headline and body text match the reference screenshots (including punctuation/ellipsis and emojis).
The modal retains a close (X) control in the top-right and can be dismissed via the X and the secondary action without breaking the summary table interaction.

file_operations.description: Update the modal headline/body copy and emoji usage to exactly match the reference screenshots (image-6.png, image-7.png), while continuing to compose existing shadcn-ui Dialog/Button components (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing). Keep existing close (X) and secondary action dismissal behavior intact.

Adjust the existing .celebration-modal and related styles (e.g., header typography, spacing, media card layout) so the modal visually matches the reference screenshots without modifying any files under frontend/src/components/ui.

requirements.summary: Show a built-in default celebration image in the modal when no selfie is selected, and revert to default on reopen until a new selfie is chosen.
acceptanceCriteria: Opening the modal without selecting a selfie shows the default celebration image.
After selecting a selfie, the modal shows the selected selfie preview (replacing the default image).
Closing and reopening the modal resets back to the default celebration image (until a new selfie is selected).

file_operations.description: Update the media area rendering logic to display the default image from frontend/public/assets/generated/celebration-default-photo.dim_900x700.png when selectedImage is null, and to replace it with the user-selected selfie preview when provided. Ensure close/reopen resets to the default (including clearing any file input value/object URL cleanup). Continue composing existing shadcn-ui components (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).

requirements.summary: Add and wire a new default celebration image as a static frontend asset used directly by the modal (no backend routing).
acceptanceCriteria: The default celebration image is present in frontend/public/assets/generated/ and loads correctly in the modal in dev and production builds.

file_operations.description: Add the new default celebration image asset (photo-like celebratory portrait) at frontend/public/assets/generated/celebration-default-photo.dim_900x700.png so it can be referenced directly by the modal.

Reference the static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/celebration-default-photo.dim_900x700.png directly in the modal’s media area default state (no backend involvement). Continue composing existing shadcn-ui components (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).
